Detailed Description

An instance of this class represents a bar, or candlestick.

The BarInfo class is used to pass open/high/low/close trade information for a given parameter (such as price range).

One can subscribe to bars from the real-time stream or replay time bars from a historical database.

See also:
BarReplayInfo
REngine::subscribeBar()
REngine::unsubscribeBar()
REngine::replayBars()
RCallbacks::Bar()
RCallbacks::BarReplay()

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

BarInfo::BarInfo (  ) 

This constructor initializes all of the members. The pData of each tsNCharcb is set to NULL and the iDataLen of each tsNCharcb is set to zero. Integer members and double members are initialized to zero. Boolean members are set to false.

BarInfo::~BarInfo (  )  [virtual]

This destructor will not deallocate memory associated with internal pointers such as the pData of any tsNCharcbs.

Member Function Documentation

int BarInfo::dump ( int *  aiCode  ) 

This routine will print the current values of the object to stdout.

Member Data Documentation

BarInfo::bCustomSession

Indicates whether this bar uses a custom session.

BarInfo::bSettlementPrice

Indicates if BarInfo::dSettlementPrice is specified or not. If this value is false, the settlement price is not specified.

BarInfo::dClosePrice

This represents the price of the last trade occurring within the time period.

BarInfo::dHighPrice

This represents the high price of all trades occurring within the time period.

BarInfo::dLowPrice

This represents the low price of all trades occurring within the time period.

BarInfo::dOpenPrice

This represents the price of the first trade occurring within the time period.

BarInfo::dSettlementPrice

If available for daily bars, the settlement price for the day.

BarInfo::dSpecifiedRange

Identifies the range of this range bar.

BarInfo::iCloseSsm

For custom sessions, the session close time, expressed as seconds since midnight.

BarInfo::iEndSsboe

Identifies the second (in ssboe format) of the end of the bar.

BarInfo::iEndUsecs

Identifies the microseconds portion of the time of the end of the bar.

BarInfo::iNumTrades

The number of trades occuring over the time period.

BarInfo::iOpenSsm

For custom sessions, the session open time, expressed as seconds since midnight.

int RApi::BarInfo::iSpecifiedMinutes
int RApi::BarInfo::iSpecifiedTicks
int RApi::BarInfo::iSpecifiedVolume
BarInfo::iStartSsboe

Identifies the second (in ssboe format) of the start of the bar.

BarInfo::iStartUsecs

Identifies the microseconds portion of the time of the start of the bar.

int RApi::BarInfo::iType
BarInfo::iVolume

The total volume of all the trades occuring over the time period.

BarInfo::pContext

The context value passed when calling REngine::subscribeBar() or REngine::replayBars() is returned in this variable.

BarInfo::sExchange

The exchange corresponding to the bar.

tsNCharcb RApi::BarInfo::sSpecifiedDate
BarInfo::sTicker

The symbol corresponding to the bar.
